Title: Relates to the use of mobile telephones or the use of portable electronic devices while in a work area or school zone
Summary: Establishes a surcharge for the use of mobile telephones or the use of portable electronic devices while in a work area or school zone.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to surcharges for the use of mobile telephones or the use of portable electronic devices while in a work area or school zone
